roleset.name: distribute again

example.name: just theme
example.text: [About a quarter of this share]-9 has already been reallocated [*-9], according to the industry, but the remaining 23,403 tons are still a lucrative target for growers because the current U.S. price of 18 cents a pound runs as much as a nickel a pound above the world rate.

example.name: with source
example.text: [*-1] To accommodate the additional cash assistance, [the House Appropriations Committee]-1 last week was required [*-1] to reallocate an estimated $140 million [*U*] from the Pentagon.

example.name: with destination
example.text: John reapportioned the chocolate cake among all his friends.

roleset.note: I actually read the "from the Pentagon" as part of the $140 million,but Treebank disagrees with me. As usual.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'reapportion' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. No 'apportion', either.
